entries.title: On South African politics, Winnie and Nelson Mandela
entries.note: Excellent episode on Conversations with Tyler. I like that framing “policing works only if the community accepts being policed”. Also have to read this book!

entries.title: On Islamic Civilization and Modernity
entries.note: Fab read. Reminded me of Pankaj Mishra’s “From the Ruins of Empire” - sometimes I think how recent these dramatic historical changes are and how we’re still living in the immediate aftermath of these events.
